elements.name: User can add product from Accessories to shopping-cart

steps.name: User logs-in to his account
hovers on the Accessories category
chooses shoes subcategory
redirected to the shoes subcategory showing Shoes header
filters all pairs of shoes by Price from low to high
all pairs of shoes will be sorted by price
views details of the chosen shoes product
redirected to Dorian shoes details
selects color of the shoes product
chooses size of the shoes product
adds to cart
redirected to the checkout-cart

name: Logged user could select different Categories

steps.name: user navigates to the login webpage

elements.name: user logs-in using valid username and valid password

steps.name: user enters "boogiemon@divalia.cf" and "123456"
user is logged-in to his account
user navigates to the login webpage

elements.name: user logs-in using valid username and invalid password

steps.name: user enters "boogiemon@divalia.cf" and "654321"
user is not logged-in to his account

name: user logs-in using username and password

steps.name: user navigates to the register webpage
user inserts needed info
submit
